data.title: Dr. Bill Sterett
data.meta_description: Vail's Premier Orthopaedic Surgeon and Sports Medicine Specialist. Knee, Shoulder, and Specializing in The Female ACL.
data.text:
Knee

As former managing partner of the Steadman-Hawkins clinic and currently practicing at the prestigious Vail-Summit Orthopaedics & Neurosurgery, Dr. Sterett has helped countless top athletes and weekend warriors get back on top of their game

Shoulder

Dr. Sterett is dual-fellowship trained with an added certificate in sports medicine. His training and experience in treating shoulder injuries surgically makes him a top expert in repairing injuries to this important part of the body.

Utilizing Biologics

Dr. Sterett has been integrating biologics such as stem cell treatment and PRPs (biologics) into his treatment plans for years, making him a top expert in this area. Many times stem cell treatments require no extra charge.

“Dr. Sterett exemplifies what a great surgeon and healthcare provider should be. He has the care, skill, and judgment to provide complex care but retains his humility and sense of humor. He has built a surgical team that is responsive to patient needs and extremely accommodating. After shoulder surgery, I can fully attest to Dr. Sterett’s professionalism and feel fortunate to have had such a fantastic outcome twice!”

— Andy G.

“Thank you for the great care and follow up. After missing an entire ski season I am thrilled to be back hiking, biking, and playing tennis this summer and fall. I will gladly recommend you to all of my friends. Thanks again and counting the days until the Mountain opens and I can ski on my new and improved knee.”

— Lauren, San Francisco

“Both he and his team are the best! They are knowledgeable, caring, kind and on point with each individual treatment. I have had two major surgeries with him and could not imagine going through either without him. I will continue to recommend Dr. Sterett to anyone looking for orthopedic help. Thank you Dr. Sterett and team!”

— Kayla, Colorado
